name: Gunning Over It! DEMO
description:
Inspired by Getting Over It! and jump king and other rage platformers. You play as a gun and climb obstacles. This is just a small demo to get feedback so please if this is your type of game, do let me know how you feel!

You can wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1680370/Gunning_Over_It/

I would really appreciate a wishlist even if you dont intend on buying it

CONTROLS ARE IN THE README FILE
